#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int rev_num1,rev_num2,t,num1,num2,rev_num,num,flag;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&rev_num1,&rev_num2);
		num1=0;
		num2=0;
		num=0;
		flag=0;
		while(rev_num1>0)
		{
			if(rev_num1%10!=0 || flag==1)
		    {
				 num1=num1*10+rev_num1%10;
				 flag=1;
	    	}  
			rev_num1=rev_num1/10;
			if(rev_num1==0)
              break;
		}
		flag=0;
		while(rev_num2>0)
		{
			 if(rev_num2%10!=0 || flag==1)
		    {
				 num2=num2*10+rev_num2%10;
				 flag=1;
			 }
			 rev_num2=rev_num2/10;
			 if(rev_num2==0)
				 break;
		}
		rev_num=num1+num2;
		flag=0;
		while(rev_num>0 || flag==1)
		{
			 if(rev_num%10!=0)
		    {
				 num=num*10+rev_num%10;
				 flag=1;
			 }
			 rev_num=rev_num/10;
			 if(rev_num==0)
				 break;
		}
		printf("%d\n",num);
	}
   return 0;
}
